Room.Name: Necropolis Path
Room.ShortDescription: You are on a path in the northeastern section of the great Necroplis.
Room.LongDescription: Not far from here, to the east, is the Tomb of Eldritch. Eldritch was one of the later heros of Oceancrest and rose to a very high level before he was killed in a fight with the undead, not far from this very spot. In the distance you see several white marble monuments and statues.
